name: Monk
shortDescription: Martial artists who channel inner ki to perform supernatural feats.
description: Monks are masters of disciplined combat, blending physical training with spiritual focus. Through ki, they achieve speed, precision, and supernatural resilience.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor or wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

features.name: Martial Arts
features.description: You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for monk weapons and unarmed strikes, and gain a bonus unarmed strike.

features.name: Ki
features.description: You gain a pool of ki points that fuel special monk abilities.

features.name: Unarmored Movement
features.description: Your speed increases while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield.

features.name: Monastic Tradition
features.description: Choose a Monastic Tradition that shapes your ki techniques.

features.name: Deflect Missiles
features.description: You can use your reaction to reduce damage from a ranged weapon attack.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Slow Fall
features.description: You can reduce falling damage using your reaction.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice when you take the Attack action.

features.name: Stunning Strike
features.description: When you hit a creature, you can spend ki to attempt to stun it.

features.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
features.description: Your unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistance.

features.name: Monastic Tradition Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your Monastic Tradition.

features.name: Evasion
features.description: You take no damage on a successful Dexterity saving throw and half on a failure.

features.name: Stillness of Mind
features.description: You can end one effect on yourself that is causing you to be charmed or frightened.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Purity of Body
features.description: You are immune to disease and poison.

features.name: Monastic Tradition Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your Monastic Tradition.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
features.description: You can understand and communicate with any creature that knows a language.

features.name: Diamond Soul
features.description: You gain proficiency in all saving throws.

features.name: Timeless Body
features.description: You suffer none of the frailty of old age.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Empty Body
features.description: You can become invisible and gain resistance to all damage but force.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Perfect Self
features.description: When you roll initiative and have no ki remaining, you regain ki.
